game.title: The Dragon Slayer
game.description: The village has been under the terror of a mighty dragon. Your mission is to slay the dragon and bring peace to the village
game.reward: 3000 Gold Coins and the Dragon's Pearl

tasks.description: Use your map and find the dragon's lair located in the Dark Forest
Before confronting the dragon, you must first eliminate his guards. Be cautious as they are dangerous
Once you have cleared the guards, proceed to defeat the dragon. Good luck!
